resources.string: You’ll need to use this account info to log in to the VPN for the first time.
You can now log in to your Hotspot Shield account with the following username and password.

A virtual private network (VPN) protects your identity and data online. It creates an encrypted connection to the internet which hides your IP address and personal, trackable data.\n\nThis is particularly important when you use unsecure public WiFi in places like airports and cafes because these connections are often very easy to hack. But it can also allow you to anonymously access blocked content on streaming services and social networking sites.
What does the partnership with Hotspot Shield mean for me?
It means you have a top-rated VPN included in your Dashlane Premium plan. You just need to set it up via Dashlane the first time. After that, you can use the VPN via the Hotspot Shield app itself.
For additional questions about how to set up the VPN, please see our %1$s.\n\nFor help with the Hotspot Shield app, please visit the %2$s.
Your Dashlane VPN is now provided by Hotspot Shield
